name: The Chocolate Factory (Drentsoft Games Ltd)
description:
Made for Sketchster Game Jam 2023.

It is probably best to play a Windows or Linux build if you can, the web should work but it will likely play VERY slowly.
The web export is too large to load apparently :(.

Help Tev escape the evil Chocolatier's lair and bring chocolate back to his village!

Controls

WASD: Move

Shift: Sprint

Ctrl: Crouch

Space: Jump

E: Interact

Known Issues:

If you get stuck on the stairs in the last section, try looking up a bit.

If you have trouble pressing buttons in the last section, walk away, line up and try again... it's a bit of a glitch.

If you get stuck in general... Press Y to restart the current section.

Backstory

I was hoping to make the game a little more challenging with some puzzles, alas glitches slowed me down and I wasn't able to implement everything.
